mdRecord.dcterms:title: Pocket instrument set
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Powers & Anderson Surgical Instruments [manufacturer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Set includes tenaculum, curved probe point bistoury, and scalpel, contained in a leather two-fold case. Label inside the case reads "Powers & Anderson Surg'l Inst's, &c, Richmond Virginia."
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Medical instruments and apparatus
